system.effect: The attack cuts open the target's abdomen, threatening to expose his entrails. The target suffers Blood Loss. Permanently reduce his Toughness characteristic by 1d5. Until he receives medical attention, at the end of each round, if he took any actions (besides holding his guts in and waiting for a medic), roll 1d10.
